mapper.select: SELECT image_id, facility_id, image_path, image_alt_text, image_order, is_main_image, upload_date, updated_at FROM facility_images WHERE facility_id = #{facilityId} ORDER BY image_order ASC, upload_date ASC

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO facility_images ( facility_id, image_path, image_alt_text, image_order, is_main_image, upload_date ) VALUES ( #{facilityId}, #{imagePath}, #{imageAltText}, #{imageOrder}, #{isMainImage}, NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE facility_images SET image_path = #{imagePath}, image_alt_text = #{imageAltText}, image_order = #{imageOrder}, is_main_image = #{isMainImage}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE image_id = #{imageId}
